features: Honey Mango with Aloe Vera and Vitamine E
body.description: This unique blend of lubricating emolients maximizes absorpton of water, lifting and softening unwanted hair for effortless razor glide and reducing the risk of nicks, cuts and irritation. Enriched with pure aloe vera, nourishing vitamine E and botanical skin conditioners that help deliver a smooth and soothing shave with lasting comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shave product
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for sensitive skin. Makes shaving easy and gives a smooth finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A friend recommended it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is very smooth and moisturizing! Does not suds up. Generous size tube. Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth. A friend recommended it so, O ordered some and I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best there is!
reviews.reviewText: Ar last.. a means of getting the great Shaving Lotion without making a long trip to Trader Joes.This is the very best shaving lotion/cream out there by a mile.I have very sensitive skin and the various foams, creams and lotions I have tried over the years simply irritated me no matter whatThen about 5 years ago I stumbled upon Trader Joe's Honey Mango Shave Cream and Bamm! Gone was the irritation I had suffered for years before.It is a little thinner that what you might be used to but a very small amount goes a very long way and doesn't clog up your razor.Shaving once a day, a tube typically lasts me about 3 months.That makes it great value for money, even with the markup here over the TJ price.I couldn't recommend this product enough!!!5+ Stars for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2010
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this shaving cream! It's vegan/paraben free, which is always nice. The scent is perfect... It's nice, but very subtle, unlike most shaving creams I've come across. It doesn't foam like crazy (a sure sign of less chemicals than the average) and makes my skin feel AMAZING. I have very sensitive skin, and it NEVER irritates it.The biggest proof of how much I love this: I live in Holland, and when I visit a city in the states with a TJ, I BRING IT HOME WITH ME. When I move to Austin, TX at the end of year, where there is still no Trader Joe's, I'm going to order it from Amazon.I can't imagine using any of the standard stuff now that I've tried this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For legs is perfect!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on the other reviews and I have to say that if you want to shave your legs with this, you have a very clean shave and smooth legs, I really liked it.I also read in some reviews it was perfect for the bikini area and helped with bumps. Honestly I am a chicken and I would never do laser or anything that would hurt me bad. I tried the strips and I couldn't deal with the pain and I have tried other products that would never try again in my life but I suffer from bikini bumps every time I shave and I hate it!! It itches and the bumps hurt at the same time, I can never feel comfortable.I wanted to try this cream in the bikini area and even though it is clean and smooth and the vitamin E helps, I do not think it helps with the bumps.I gave it 4 stars because it is really nice for the legs but if you are looking to buy this product for the bikini area to avoid bumps, then this is not the product for that area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars probably some of the best shaving cream I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: probably some of the best shaving cream I've ever used. No weird scents. Doesn't lather much but I don't think thats really necessary. Leave skin feeling super smooth and moisturized. I have also noticed the hair doesn't grow back nearly as quickly nor as coarse as with other gels/creams while using the same razors. It is significantly cheaper to pick this up in your local Trader Joe's however. I don't understand why they gauge the price on Amazon just go to the store. Same goes for TJ's other hygiene products, they are all cheaper in the store and all that I've tried have been awesome (check out the Coco butter)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Shaving Product for a Reasonable Price
reviews.reviewText: Though fairly cheap in comparison to some other branded shaving creams & soaps this is actually one of my favorite shaving products. Most shaving products fall into around 3 categories it seems - hard soaps that you have to lather up, creams that lather up, and this type that dont lather but dont really need to - the idea that you apply it directly without lathering. I like that its ready for use right away without lathering and I find it puts a good protective coat on my skin and helps in the cutting very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yummy and SO SO Soft
reviews.reviewText: A friend treated me with this product once for my birthday and I have used it every since.
